hero.subtitle: HSwift empowers businesses to automate, scale, and optimize their conversational experiences with intelligent multi-tenant agent management.

features.title: Everything you need to scale conversations
features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to help businesses of all sizes manage and optimize their conversational AI experiences.

list.title: WhatsApp Integration
list.description: Seamlessly connect and manage multiple WhatsApp Business numbers with advanced automation.

list.title: Multi-Tenant Management
list.description: Organize clients, phone numbers, and conversations in isolated tenant environments.

list.title: Advanced Analytics
list.description: Track performance metrics, response times, and conversation success rates in real-time.

list.title: Intelligent Automation
list.description: Create complex conversation flows with AI-powered agent graphs and templates.

list.title: Enterprise Security
list.description: Role-based access control, secure API management, and data protection compliance.

list.title: Omnichannel Support
list.description: Manage conversations across multiple channels from one unified dashboard.

pricing.title: Simple, transparent pricing
pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that fits your business needs. All plans include our core features with increasing limits and advanced capabilities.

plans.name: Free
plans.description: Perfect for small businesses getting started

finalCta.title: Ready to transform your customer conversations?
finalCta.subtitle: Join thousands of businesses already using HSwift to automate and scale their WhatsApp communication.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome back! Here's what's happening with your conversations.

proPlan.title: You are currently on Pro.
proPlan.description: Unlock the full potential with Premium.

freePlan.title: Free Plan
freePlan.description: You are on the Free Plan. Upgrade to unlock more features.

premiumPlan.title: Premium Plan.
premiumPlan.description: You are ready to unleash your full power.

usersAndRoles.title: Users & Roles
usersAndRoles.description: Manage who has access to your platform and what they can do.

roles.title: Roles
roles.permissionsDescription: Define what users with this role can access and do.

roleDescriptions.admin: Full access to all features and settings.
roleDescriptions.editor: Can create and edit content, but not manage settings.
roleDescriptions.agent: Can manage conversations and interact with customers.
roleDescriptions.viewer: Read-only access to conversations and analytics.
roleDescriptions.system: Internal system role with specific permissions.

header.title: Unified Inbox
header.description: All your conversations in one place. Reply, resolve, and collaborate.

board.noConversations: No conversations found in this status.

conversationsView.title: Conversations
conversationsView.description: Monitor and manage all customer conversations

header.title: Connect, Automate, Succeed.
header.description: Integrate your favorite tools in minutes and build effortless workflows. From Slack notifications to custom APIs, HSwift is your command center.
header.step1: One-Click Connect: Choose from our growing list of apps and authorize the connection. It's that simple!
header.step2: Bring Your Own API: Define your own endpoints just like in Postman to build custom integrations. No limits.

boe.name: Boe Integration
boe.description: Custom API for internal operations and automated workflows.

slack.name: Slack
slack.description: Send notifications and alerts directly to your team's channels.

zendesk.name: Zendesk
zendesk.description: Sync conversations and tickets with your customer support platform.

toolSets.title: Tool Sets
toolSets.description: Pre-built packages of tools to enhance your agents' capabilities.

boe.name: Boe Tools
boe.description: A collection of tools for interacting with the Boe API, including user management and order processing.

search.name: Internet Search Tool
search.description: A powerful tool to perform web searches and get up-to-date information from the internet.

header.title: Agent Management
header.description: Create, configure, and manage your AI agents.

hermes.description: Hello, I'm Hermes, in charge of messaging and ensuring your communications flow without interruptions.

boet.description: I'm Boet, your sales specialist. My goal is to identify opportunities and close deals efficiently.

maui.description: You're welcome! I'm Maui, demigod of the wind and sea, ready to perform incredible feats for you.

templates.title: Template Analytics
templates.description: Performance metrics for your message templates.

assistant.title: AI Assistant
assistant.description: Ask me anything about your analytics, and I'll find the answer for you.
assistant.placeholder: Ask about your business stats, like 'what was the conversion rate in May?'

membership.title: Membership & Billing
membership.subtitle: Manage your subscription, view invoices, and track your usage.
